授業目的: Under the special/hardship circumstances of COVID-19, this individual research course is designed as a temporary and contingency plan for “Alter Ego” of internship programme. This is in view that despite his/her efforts, student, who unfortunately could not find an opportunity to experience in internship, are given opportunity to write quality research paper(s). Undertaking oral presentation is an option.
到達目標: Students are able to enhance their ability to produce quality research paper in focusing their research interests and to hone the presentation skills. This process would equip student in exploring his/her future internship and career development.
授業方法: Work plan of research paper writing should be developed in close consultation with the designated faculty member(s). Periodic and individual meetings has to be worked out in monitoring the progress. Students of School of Policy Studies are not allowed to use the theme of MA graduation thesis for the above purpose but to explore a different topic to undertake the research task. Thus, selection of the topic should be consulted with the designated supervisor and UNFA Office for registration procedure.

トピック.授業計画1: Coaching session will be conducted on demand basis.
トピック.授業外学習2: Student is requested to conduct individual research on daily basis.
